trans-unit.source: A binding element that can be added to a WCF client application to take advantage of the Discovery client channel.
trans-unit.target: 一个绑定元素，可以将此元素添加到 WCF 客户端应用程序以利用 Discovery 客户端通道。

trans-unit.source: The Discovery client channel allows a WCF client application to access a discoverable service without knowing the endpoint address in advance.
trans-unit.target: Discovery 客户端通道允许 WCF 客户端应用程序访问可发现的服务，而不必事先知道相应的终结点地址。

trans-unit.source: The Discovery client channel is used by creating a custom binding element and adding a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> to the top of the binding stack.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过创建自定义绑定元素并将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> 添加至绑定堆栈的顶部来使用 Discovery 客户端通道。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the Discovery client channel, see [Using the Discovery Client Channel](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-the-discovery-client-channel.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] Discovery 客户端通道，请参阅[使用 Discovery 客户端通道](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-the-discovery-client-channel.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement" /> class with default values.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认值初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement.FindCriteria%2A> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> 设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.UdpDiscoveryEndpoint>，并且 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement.FindCriteria%2A> 为空。

trans-unit.source: An object that gets a discovery endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取发现终结点的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the information required to search for a service provider.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其中包含搜索服务提供程序所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement" /> class with the specified endpoint provider and service finding criteria.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的终结点提供程序和服务查找条件初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel factory to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的通道工厂的类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context.
trans-unit.target: 绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a channel factory for producing channels of a specific type from the binding context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化通道工厂，以便从绑定上下文生成指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: The channel factory of the specified type initialized from the binding context.
trans-unit.target: 从绑定上下文初始化的指定类型的通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel listener to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的通道侦听器的类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context.
trans-unit.target: 绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Building a channel listener is not supported by the Discovery client channel.
trans-unit.target: Discovery 客户端通道不支持生成通道侦听器。

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden to initialize a channel listener to accept channels of a specified type from the binding context.
trans-unit.target: 可以重写此方法以初始化通道侦听器，以便接受绑定上下文中指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: The channel listener of the specified type initialized from the context.
trans-unit.target: 从上下文初始化的指定类型的通道侦听器。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel for which the factory is being tested.
trans-unit.target: 要为其进行工厂测试的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context.
trans-unit.target: 绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the current binding can build a channel factory stack on the client.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示当前绑定是否可以在客户端上生成通道工厂堆栈。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified channel factory stack can be built on the client; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以在客户端上生成指定的通道工厂堆栈，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the listener accepts.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器接受的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context.
trans-unit.target: 绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Because building a channel listener is not supported by the Discovery client channel, this method always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 因为 Discovery 客户端通道不支持生成通道侦听器，所以此方法总是返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: It may be extended to return a value that indicates whether the binding element can build a listener for a specific type of channel.
trans-unit.target: 可以对此方法进行扩展以返回一个值，用于指示绑定元素是否可以为特定类型的通道生成侦听器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1" /> of the specified type can be built by the binding element, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定元素可以生成指定类型的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 创建绑定元素的副本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 绑定元素的副本。

trans-unit.source: A static temporary address that acts as a placeholder until the actual service address is resolved.
trans-unit.target: 静态临时地址，在解析实际服务地址之前用作占位符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the discovery endpoint provider.
trans-unit.target: 获取发现终结点提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint provider.
trans-unit.target: 终结点提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the find criteria.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置查找条件。

trans-unit.source: The find criteria.
trans-unit.target: 查找条件。

trans-unit.source: The type of object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The binding context.
trans-unit.target: 绑定上下文。

trans-unit.source: Returns an object of the requested type, if present in the binding stack.
trans-unit.target: 返回请求类型的对象（如果绑定堆栈中存在）。

trans-unit.source: An object of the specified type if present, otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定类型的对象（如果存在）；否则为 <see langword="null" />。
